name: event-service
description: Event service for intercom and ip camera

scripts.start: concurrently -k "npm run start:beward" "npm run start:beward_ds" "npm run start:qtech" "npm run start:is" "npm run start:akuvox" "npm run start:rubetek"  "npm run start:sputnik"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev:beward" "npm run dev:beward_ds" "npm run dev:qtech" "npm run dev:is" "npm run dev:akuvox" "npm run dev:rubetek" "npm run dev:sputnik"
scripts.dev:debug: NODE_ENV=development concurrently -k "npm run dev:beward" "npm run dev:beward_ds" "npm run dev:qtech" "npm run dev:is" "npm run dev:akuvox" "npm run dev:rubetek" "npm run dev:sputnik"
